thread.title: Russian Media Outlets Are Spreading A False Photo Of The London Attack Suspect
thread.title_full: Russian Media Outlets Are Spreading A False Photo Of The London Attack Suspect - BuzzFeed News

author: Jane Lytvynenko
title: Russian Media Outlets Are Spreading A False Photo Of The London Attack Suspect
text:
“Photo: London terrorist held a knife with a green handle,” the headline reads. ID: 10751413 4. In addition to repeating the claim on live television, Russia 24’s parent company Vesti also promoted the false article and image on Facebook, where the company’s page has over 1,700,000 followers. View this image ›
Facebook / vesti.ru ID: 10751498 Vesti did not immediately respond to emailed requests for comment, and has posted no corrections or retractions.
ID: 10751505 6. They weren’t the only Russian outlets to use the incorrect image. According to a tweet from Moscow Echo editor Vladimir Varfolomeev, broadcaster Channel 5 also had a story featuring the wrong man as the suspect. That story has since been removed from its website. @Varfolomeev
— Владимир Варфоломеев (@Varfolomeev) ID: 10751578 7. Live Updates On Westminster Attack ID: 10751761 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Jane Lytvynenko is a reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in Toronto, Canada. Contact Jane Lytvynenko at jane.lytvynenko@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
